virtualJoy.cpp
Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 #include <ros/ros.h>
00002 #include <sensor_msgs/Joy.h>
00003 
00004 int main(int argc, char **argv)
00005 {
00006         ros::init(argc, argv, "virtual_trim_joystick");
00007         ros::NodeHandle n;
00008         ROS_INFO("created nodehandle");
00009         sensor_msgs::Joy trimInput;
00010         trimInput.axes.resize(4);
00011         double ail, elev, throt, rud;
00012         if(!ros::param::getCached("init/aileron", ail)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -init/position- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00013         if(!ros::param::getCached("init/elevator", elev)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -init/position- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00014         if(!ros::param::getCached("init/throttle", throt)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -init/position- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00015         if(!ros::param::getCached("init/rudder", rud)) {ROS_FATAL("Invalid parameters for -init/position- in param server!"); ros::shutdown();}
00016         trimInput.axes[0] = -1 * ail; //Set aileron
00017         trimInput.axes[1] = -1 * elev; //Set elevator
00018         trimInput.axes[2] = -1 * rud; //Set rudder
00019         trimInput.axes[3] = (2 * throt -1); //Set throttle
00020         ros::Publisher pub = n.advertise<sensor_msgs::Joy>("joy",1);
00021         ROS_INFO("virtual Joystick ready");
00022 
00023         while (ros::ok())
00024         {
00025                 ros::spinOnce();
00026                 trimInput.header.stamp = ros::Time::now();
00027                 pub.publish(trimInput);
00028         }
00029 
00030         return 0;
00031 }
